name: C out
summary:
Find your way out!! 
 
One-handed game, swipe to move!  
Dodge waves of bots and bullets! 
Key point is to attract fire to kill them!  
With time-slowing skills!  
Hong long can you survive? 
 
C OUT by 小薯製作 SiuShu Studio (marcochanyh) 
 
Game Features: 
 - Over 10 types of bots and combination can be deadly (mini-gun, missile, laser etc.) 
 - Unlock over 100 levels and an endless mode for brave challengers 
 - Unlock 30 characters with different skills and rarity (time-slow, invisible, immortal etc.) 
 - It also contains leaderboard to challenge other player's highscore! 
 - Check our FB page to get a character in game! 
 
 
Share screenshots to friends and challenge them on different level and characters! 
Simple and fun, enjoy it anytime anywhere! 
Survive and be the last one who stays! 
 
**********Credits*********( in no particular order) 
Thanks for the following people who helped me testing the game and giving me ideas:
